meanings.definition: A person who is killed because of their religious or other beliefs.
meanings.sent1: The martyrs bravely stood up for what they believed in.
meanings.sent2: The community honored the martyrs who died for their faith.
meanings.sent3: The play depicted the martyrs as heroes of their faith.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to her beliefs made her a martyr in the eyes of many.
meanings.sent5: The stories of the martyrs inspired others to stay true to their convictions.

meanings.definition: A person who sacrifices something of great value for the sake of principle.
meanings.sent1: The martyrs sacrificed their own comfort for the greater good.
meanings.sent2: She was willing to be a martyr for the cause she believed in.
meanings.sent3: The group jokingly called themselves martyrs for giving up dessert.
meanings.sent4: His decision to resign was seen as a martyrdom for his principles.
meanings.sent5: The martyrs of history remind us of the importance of standing up for what is right.
